transcript:
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Naan sollunga ma.
Customer: Aah sollunga. Ippadi poneenga by leads apdinnu irukkum bodhu nambala choose panni edukka mudiyum sir. Adhavadhu ippo exact ah for example ippo oru by lead onnu post aairukken sir automatic sliding glass.
Customer: Unga voice voice romba low ah irukku. Clear ah enna pesuringannu enakku puriyala maari irukku romba.
Executive: Kekudha sir?
Customer: Kekudhu ma sollunga.
Executive: Kekudhu illa actually sir ippo by lead post pannumbodhu paatheenga appdinnna nambala choose panni edukka mudiyum sir. Andha client ippo IndiaMART la enna porul vaangittu irukkaanga and avangalumae edhavadhu product vandhu sale panraangala appdinnradhu key issue aagum. Buyer sales appdinnradhu. Adhu paarkumbodhu like customer yaaraavadhu by lead post pannumbodhu namma deal panra same keyword eatha buyer sales appdinnra idathilumae koduthurundhuchu appdinnna kandippa nambala maari onnu supplier ah iruppaanga. Appdi illanna like namma kitta irundhu service vaangittu like idhu enna sir reference moolamaa iruppom illaiyaa. So innoru person kaaga vandhu avanga check panni paakravangalaa iruppaanga appdinnradhu nambala by lead mooliyamaa choose pannikka mudiyum sir.
Customer: Oru nalla oru value ulla by lead ku ivlo namma search research laam panni edukkaradhukkulla adhu consume aayidum. Timing mudinjirum illa consume aayidum. Sold out aayidum. Udana udana edukraanga appdinnna evlo speed aaga oru nalla lead oru quantity oru one lakh melaam vandhaalae ottanae onnu edukraanga.
Customer: Ayyo mudiyala appdiyae potti potti eduthaalum adhu oru namakku competitor oru eppdi kurainjadhu oru lead oru by lead ethana per edukraanga maam anju per edukraangalaa.
Executive: Aah sir aamaa avangalaoda serthu five members iruppaanga sir.
Customer: Anju per avanga kodukkara rate avanga enna namma first pesumbodhu namma kitta compromise aagura customer thiruppi avanga enna rate pesuraanga engirundhu pesuraangannu theriyala. Namma enna rate irukkalae low rate sonnaa kooda rate adhikkamaa irukku appdingraanga. Andha maari unmaiyae fact aa unmaiyae andha lead vandhu matha namma naan enna thavirthi irukkira naalu andha lead edukra naalu per vandhu naalu vendor companies vandhu unmaiyae andha rate thaan kodukkraangalaa illa appdinnu namakku doubt aa irukku. Yenna ippo naangalae market la oru oru product ah oru 175 rupees vaanguronnaa oru 20 rupees extra vachu solluvom.
Executive: Margin base panni.
Customer: Aamaa margine illama koduthaa kooda avanga illai idhukkum kammiyaa solraanga appdingraanga. Namakku adhu aacharyamaa irukku andha maari possible ae illai kidaikkavae vaaippillai. Aanaa appdillaam pogudhu.
Executive: Oru sila per solradhukkum undu illa sir ippo buyers vandhu solraanga appdinnna maybe ippo namma avanga kammiyaa koduthaanganu sonnom appdinnna maybe namma innum kammiyaa koduppom appdinnra mind set la vandhu namma solluvaanga oru sila per. Yenna nambalaala verify panna mudiyadhu illaiyaa sir andha supplier vandhu ivangalukku enna pricing kodukkraanga appdinnra maari. So andha concern la oru sila per buyer vandhu sollavaum chance irukku sir. Like avanga kammiyaa kodukkraanga neenga enna ivlo amount quote panreenga appdinnra maari. But aanaa so thevai irukkira client vandhu kandippa yaarkittaiyaavadhu servicing vaanga thaan poraanga. So nambaraa konjam edukkaradhu konjam proper aa eduthom appdinnna kandippa better aa irukkumnu ninaikkireenga sir. Indha sales mattum neenga.
Customer: Share market la vilaiyaadra maari irukku maam nambalaala handle pannavae mudiyala romba enakku manavulaichal aa thaan aagudhu adha. Poraadi adha tak tak tak nu edukkanum oru vela net slow aa irukkum running la iruppom illa edhaavadhu irukkum. Namma notification vandha udanae poraadi edukrom edukra andha anju per la indha prachana vandhuttae irukku romba cheap aa thaan irukkirathilae rate solraanga idhukku mela namakku margine illama rate sonnaa kooda appdium keela solraangannraanga. Appdillaam paarkkarathilae kidaiyaadhu adhu ennaannu enakku theriyala onnu idhu major onnu. Second indha maari irukku naan neenga solradhellaam naan search panni ennaala edukkaradhukkullae adhu consume aayirudhu.
Executive: Hmm yes sir.
Customer: Indha by lead panna mudiyala adhu thaan.
Executive: Illa adhu naan ungalukku sollirundhen illaiyaa sir today's before connect pannumbodhu andha past leads appdinnradhu neenga oru one week ku kodutheenga appdinnna sir ungalukku andha preference vandhu.
Customer: Adhu thaan oru.
Executive: Adhu panni paarkkalaam sir yes sir adhu namma eppdinnna at least neenga oru 15 days or one week neenga koduthaalae ungalukku change aaguradhu difference namma kandupudikka paarkkalaam. Before ungalukku eppdi vandhuttu irundhadhu before after ungalukku adhu thaan namma preference set panradhu maari irukkum. Yenna system endradhukkulla namma theriyapaduthara maari irukkum enakku indha keyword vaenum appdinnra maari. So once adhu mark aayiduchu appdinnna automatic aa unga preference change aagum based on ungalukku vara andha by lead sold out aagudhu illaiyaa sir most of the leads. So andha preference appdinnradhu konjam konjamaa ungalukku rise aagum. Mudhala ungalukku show aagura maari andha maari irukkum sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: So idhu mattum neenga oru 15 days ku mattum konjam regular aa neenga leads check pannunga sir check panni edukumbodhu past edukreengalo adhae maari indha past leads appdinnradhumae vandhu select panni edukra maari vandhu paarunga.
Customer: Pannidraen maam show panraen enakku vera edhaavadhu catalog la edhaavadhu changes pannitteengalaa.
Executive: Illa sir last thaan namma andha rendu keyword mattum neenga panradhu andha famous partition adhu mattum naan add pannirundheenga sir keywords add panni photos mattum neenga.
Customer: Neenga edhaavadhu modify panraen konjam moderate aa edho something panni adha konjam highlight panni kaattra maari sollirundheenga.
Executive: Aah adhu thaan keyword base panni naan change pannitteenga sir adhavadhu ippo endha endha keywords laam vandhu ippo oru oru keyword ku sir ippo ivlo thaan lead generate aagudhunradhu engalukku theriya varum. Ippdi andha leads koduthu naan ungalukku onnonnaa change pannittu irukkaen. Automatic aa ippo toughened glass idhellaam paatheenga appdinnna 9000 kitta lead vandhu generate aagudhu every year idhu.
Customer: Adhu illa maam facade glass nu naan oru periya key adhu vandhu rare aa use pannuvaanga. Adhu aanaa adhu oru nalla value varum chinnadhaa oru thogai enquiry pannaa kooda adhu competitor um kammiyaa iruppaanga. Adhukku work panravangalum kammi kammiyaa iruppaanga andha enquiry onnu kooda enakku ippovaraikkum facade work elevation work ippovaraikkum vandhadhae illai. Aanaa facade facade glazing.
Customer: Facade glazing glazing sir irukeengalaa.
Customer: Hmm aamaa.
Executive: So one minute sir. Andha keyword namma vandhu add pannirukkom sir one minute irunga adhukku andha keyword ku mattum naan evlo vandhu lead generation mattum naan check pannikkiraen.
Executive: AC glass glazing um adhu same thaan sir.
Customer: Enna maam?
Executive: AC glass appdinnu sollittu irukku glass glazing appdinnu sollittu idhumae same thaan sir. Indha keyword umae andha neenga sonna keyword thaan sir.
Customer: Hmm aamaa adhu related thaan aanaa major aa facade work thaan facade glazing adhu periya oru key vandhu adhu ellaarukkum vandhu theriyavum seiyaadhu rare aa thaan enquiry varum andha enquiry vandhaa 100% technical knowledge architect engineers ku mattum thaan andha keyword correct aa theriyum. Adhu vandhaa nalla value vaam varum adha kaattum. Consume panravangalum kammiyaa thaan iruppaanga ellaarumae adha eduthura maattaanga onnu ippo glass appdinnna adhukku oru laksham perukku mela irukkaanga. Illai illai oru laksham dealer vendor laam neriya irukkaanga adha edukraangalaam romba kammi ippo adhu appdi yennaa adha execution panradhu romba kashtam summa namma glass rate um kooda sollidra mudiyadhu adhula neriya variety irukku neriya structure design knowledge vaenum adhukku romba adhanaala rare company thaan adha irukkum India mart la romba thaan iruppaanga facade panravanga romba kammiyaa thaan iruppaanga.
Executive: Correct sir aamaa.
Customer: Aanaa vandhu namakku adhu varavae illai oru lead kooda indha nalla varala adhu thaan oru.
Executive: Illa sir actually andha glazing service facade glazing service appdinnra keyword ku total aa one year ku 120 thaan lead generate aagudhu sir. Yenna naan andha keyword main pottae search panraen neenga sonna maari thaan yaa ellaarukkumae andha keyword name theriyala. Theriyadhu aanaa correct name adhu thaan. Adhu ennanradha ungalukku explain panraen simple aa endha factory vandhaalum endha IT company vandhaalum endha oru tech park vandhaalum adhu thaan full aa elevation irukkum neenga paathurukeenga blue color glass vandhu appdi checked checked aa irukkum box box aa irukkum. Full potential ulla adhu oru work andha key aanaa andha key yaarukkumae theriyaadhu normal andha glass work summa sadhaarana glass kadai vachirukkavangalo dealer kannaadi fittings vachirukkavanga avangalukku theriyaavae theriyaadhu adhu appdiyae therinjaalum ungalala execution team avangatta irukkaadhu yennaa technical knowledge avangalukku irukkaadhu.
Executive: Correct sir aamaa.
Customer: Hmm sollunga maam okay. Indha major appo idhu mattum vaenaa ungalukku edhaavadhu enquiry base panni check panni paarunga.
Executive: Highlight panni kodunga maam adha facade glazing um ACP elevation rendu mae onnu thaan andha facade enga varudho anga ACP varum ACP varra idathula maximum facade um varum aanaa facade main glazing gladding adhu related key andha ennellam related key irukko adha konjam enakku pottu highlight panni adha namma company neriya panra maari promote panni kodutheenga appdinnna romba helpful aa irukkum illa innum next year la innum adhukku payment panni nalla pannalaannaa kooda namakku unmaiyae enakku rendu moonu order adhula vandhurukkennaa kooda naan adha focus panni poiruvaen yennaa adhulathaan competition kammi technical knowledge experience ullavangathaan adha panna mudiyum.
Executive: Aamaa correct sir aamaa.
Customer: Hmm adhu thaan yennaa summa glass nu search panravanga kooda avangalukku knowledge irukku glass oru chinna glass thaan irukkum oru chinna work irukkum oru oru 10000 work thaan irukkum adha kooda glass work appdinnu pottu evlo onnu kaettaa square feet ekkachakkamaa pottu vittraanga 1000 square feet 2000 square feet aanaa ungalukku adhu eppdi kaattumnnaa oru naalu laksham anju laksham value kaattum avangatta call panni kaettomnaa illai illai onnae onnu thaan naan pottaen adhu ethana square feet nu theriyama naan 1000 pottaen appdinnuvaanga. Idhu thaan indha maari laam nadakkudhu adhula facade la appdi panna mudiyadhu.
Executive: Puriyudhu puriyudhu sir naan andha keyword vandhu check panni paakraen sir ippo total aavae 121 thaan irukku appdinnradhumbodhu adhu namma expect panra location la post aagudhunnaa appdinnra maari theriyudhu. Naan major aa vandhu Mumbai andha IT cities la irukkum illaiyaa sir like Bengaluru IT Chennai nalla irukku maam Chennai Bengaluru adhu thaan Chennai la naan Bengaluru vandhu oru sila idathula kaattudhu sir Bengaluru kaattudhu Mumbai base panni kaattudhu. Naan Chennai appdinnradha second end la paakraen sir idhula.
Customer: Okay. Indha oru keyword sollirukeenga innum rendu sila keywords sollirukeenga sir ACP elevation work appdinnu sollittu.
Executive: Adhumae naan preference mattum ungalukku check panni anupparaen sir edhaavadhu irundhuchunnaa.
Customer: Indha work panra company search panreengalaa maam?
Executive: Illa sir keyword like ippo ungalukku sir neenga normal aa andha seller.indiamart.com la neenga edutheenga correct thaan seller page la adhu illaama trade.indiamart.com appdinnu sollittu oru page irukku sir adhu total aavae vandhu lead base panni thaan irukkum.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Andha lead base la naan glazing work ku edhaavadhu lead available aa irukkaa appdinnra maari check panni paarthaen andha idathula vandhu rendae rendu thaan show aagudhu sir onnu andha endhula onnu kaattudhu innondhu percentage la onnu show aagudhu. So adhula neenga sonna other keywords kum edhaavadhu by lead edhaavadhu post aairukkunnaa appdinnra maari check panni paakraen sir.
Customer: Seri seri seri.
Executive: Naan idhu mattum ungalukku total aa work panraen sir innum konjam pending irukku keyword base panni neenga already update pannadhae oru siladhu proper aa update aagaama irundha score base panni irundhaalum seri illa endha update um proper aa update aagala adhu mattum pending ku naan move pannirukkaen sir once ellaam proper aayiduchunnaa ungalukku lead generations appdinnradhu konjam konjamaa start aagum neengalumae andha past leads mattum paathukkoonga marakkama kodukkara maari paathukkoonga sir.
Customer: Pannidraen maam pannidraen okay okay. Sir neenga idhukku appuram contact panra maari irundheenga naan ungalukku whatsapp la text pannidraen illaiyaa.
Customer: Aamaa maam. Andha number ku direct aa contact pannunga sir yenna ippo namma text pannirukkaen maam andha number note pannirukkaen. Naan hello sir nu potturukeenga sir.
Customer: Seri maam paathukkiraen note pannikkiraen. Okay seri sir indha lead raise pannirundheenga illaiyaa oru concern mattum adhukku mattum naan close pannikkireenga sir ungalukku oru mail mattum varum satisfied appdinnra maari adhu mattum konjam koduthukkoonga.
Customer: Illa maam adha eppdi naan idhu panradhu enakku call vara by lead ellaam ennaala adha enna panradhunnu enakku theriyala by lead ippo enna en aalae call panraanga enoda department enoda fleet la irukkavangalae call panraanga adhum value laam ekkachakkamaa kodukkraanga 1500 kodukkraanga avangalukku oru vela theriyumo quantity adhikkamaa koduthaathaan response irukkumnu edhaavadhu kodukkraangalaa ennanu theriyala.
Executive: Illa sir actually ippo false appdinnradhu yaaraavadhu andha client google la poittu first keyword search panni paappaanga sir. Keyword search panni paarkumbodhu normal aa yaar yaarellaam indha servicing panraanga appdinnradhu thaan show aagum. Appdi show aagumbodhu namma customer koopudraaru maam orae nimisham pesittu naan koopudraen oru oru nimisham koopudraen.
summary:
Concerns:

- Difficulty handling by leads due to competition.

- Feels current leads are not valuable.

- Doubts the rates quoted by competitors.

- Unable to effectively use by leads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check keyword performance.

- Executive offered to highlight specific keywords.

- Executive will check and update preferences.

- Executive will text the customer on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a satisfaction mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, keywords, competition, facade, glazing, acp
